column1: Elephas maximus;Asian Elephant;The elephant's trunk is used for grasping
column3: and communicating with the herd. These animals eat mainly grasses
column5: smaller branches and fruit. Every day
column6: an adult elephant can eat up to 200 kg. These animals live about 60-70 years.;EN;https://www.iucnredlist.org/species/7140/45818198
